StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetZipCodeBySectorRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngPersonId uniqueidentifier AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @SncoicId uniqueidentifier
SELECT @SncoicId = rowguid FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = ( SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp WHERE rp.rowguid = @Recrui.ngPersonId ) AND RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = 'C' AND TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL
IF @SncoicId != @Recrui.ngPersonId -- if not a SNCOIC BEGIN
SELECT MSZ.ZIP AS ZipCode FROM USMC.MapsSectorZip MSZ INNER JOIN USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter MSR ON MSR.SectorID=MSZ.SectorID WHERE MSR.Recrui.ngPersonId=@Recrui.ngPersonId UNION SELECT MRZ.Zip AS ZipCode FROM USMC.MapsRecruiterZip MRZ WHERE MRZ.Recrui.ngPersonId=@Recrui.ngPersonId ORDER BY ZipCode ASC
END ELSE -- if a SNCOIC BEGIN SELECT MSZ.ZIP AS ZipCode FROM USMC.MapsSectorZip MSZ WHERE SectorID IN ( SELECT SectorID FROM USMC.MapsSector WHERE Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId= ( SELECT rowguid FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = ( SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp WHERE rp.rowguid = @Recrui.ngPersonId ) ) ) ORDER BY ZipCode ASC END
END
